title: Person of Interest || Nobody Can Save Me Now
author: Zurik 23M
comment: This is possibly the best POI fanvid out there. Great song selection.
you are a genius, this is BRILLANT really, the best video I ever saw about POI
This could've been a trailer for season 4, if only the POI marketing team was as brilliant as you seem to be!
I'm a huge fan of this TV show and this video is amazing, the song choice, the editing, everything's perfectly done.

Zurik, no lie, watching this video kindled enough interest in my regarding the show, that I have already watched 3 seasons of it, binge-style since I first saw this vid of yours.

Once again, bravo good sir. I really REALLY think you should do a vid on the Fall of Charlestown (Black Sails). That was quite possibly one of the most powerful scenes/season finales I have seen in many, many years and just the "Gallows" scene, Vane's "warning", and the
description:
*All the images and music used in the video belong to their respective owners. I do not own anything. This is purely fan-made video, for entertainment purpose only. Please support the artists by purchasing their original works.

WARNING: SPOILERS SEASON 4 EPISODE 11.
It was a very emotional episode, i love this show so much and now i'll make a more POI videos. I hope you enjoy this, guys!
